item.title: Function error
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

function fletchem(Flecthnum : Integer): Boolean; var x, y, t : Integer; begin //ItemCoords(1) //Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True); //Wait(150 + Random(200)); //ItemCoords(2) //Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True); MouseItem(1, True); MouseItem(2, True); Wait(1000 + Random(127)); if (IsUpText('ong')) then begin Wait((256) + Random(1353)); ChooseOption('X') TypeSend(Flecthnum); //MMouse(700, 445, 1, 2); //KeyDown(13); //Sleep(333) //KeyUp(13); //You should get better anti-ban, this WOULD get you banned pretty damned fast MarkTime(t); repeat //wait(125 + random(1000)); FindNormalRandoms; //wait(125 + random(1000)); SleepAndMoveMouse(1750 + Random(5000)); //Does what it says on the tin until (IsUpTextMulti('long', 'bow', 'ow') or (TimeFromMark(t) > 60000)) Result := True; end; Result := False; //Didn't make them end;

That compiles fine for me(Your function, just cleaned up a bit), did you call SetupSRL in your main loop?

function fletchem(Flecthnum : Integer): Boolean; var x, y : Integer; begin ItemCoords(1) Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True); Wait(150 + Random(200)); ItemCoords(2) Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True); Wait(1000 + Random(127)); if (FindNpcChatText('ong')) then begin Wait((256) + Random(1353)); ChooseOption('X') TypeSend(Fletchnum); MMouse(700, 445, 1, 2); KeyDown(13); Sleep(333) KeyUp(13); repeat wait(125 + random(1000)); FindNormalRandoms; wait(125 + random(1000)); until (IsUpTextMulti('long', 'bow', 'ow')) Result := True; end; end;
